name: Cube Escape (itch)
description:
Trapped in a "cube testing" facility for a long time. It's time to escape from it. Solve puzzles and avoid traps in order to escape! But, beware there are deadly puzzles in there.. Be carefull...

-------------------------------------------

I finally finished my project. Don't expect too much this is my first Unity2D game. I hope you like it...

-------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY / INFO:

Movement: A/D

Jump: SPACE

Interract: E

Restart Level: R

--------------------------------------------

Note: I'm currently making a 2.0 version which is going to have more stuff (levels, traps, etc...) and i'm planning a greenlight release soon!
